A short story about a young girl who embarks on a journey to find the end of the rainbow and discovers something unexpected about herself along the way.
A play that explores the themes of hope, determination, and self-discovery through the story of a girl who refuses to give up on her dream of finding the end of the rainbow.
A painting that depicts the girl's journey and the emotional journey she goes through along the way.
A poem that captures the essence of the girl's determination and the beauty of the world around her.
A documentary about the girl's journey and the impact it had on her life and the lives of those around her.
